title: The Leith Ratten case
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Murray Travers and Tristram Miall
brief_description: A dramatised recreation of the trial and conviction of Leith Ratten for the murder of his wife in Shepparton in 1970. Examines the events preceeding the trial and reexamines the evidence. Stars Danny Adcock and Julie Dawson.
description: A dramatised recreation of the trial and conviction of Leith Ratten for the murder of his wife in Shepparton in 1970. Examines the events preceeding the trial and reexamines the evidence. Stars Danny Adcock and Julie Dawson.
